member.name: M:OutSystems.NssDataStructure.CssDataStructure.MssPrepareDataToDatagrid(System.Object,System.String@,System.String@)
member.summary: Given a generic object, returns a JSON containing the meta information of the object, namely fields name and data type.
member.param: List or record to get meta data from.
JSON with the data for the data grid
JSON with the structure of the object passed.
